2124.subject: MIT
2124.descrlong: Designed to help future IT managers assess the strategic implications of adopting new technologies and enabling transformational change at the enterprise level in a knowledge-based economy. Topics include: creating business value through IT, assessing and managing risk, measuring the value of IT adoption, managing disruptive technologies, positioning the CIO in enterprise leadership, marketing innovative products, and assessing enterprise implications of technology trends.
